entries.subject: feat(copilot): add RAG citations and incident mode
feat(integrations): add integration builder with retries and dlq
feat(legal): extend ediscovery and legal holds
feat(security): add SoD policies and access reviews
feat(api): add configurable tax engine for checkout
fix: stabilize prisma schema and control-plane build
feat: product telemetry events and control-plane adoption dashboard
feat(sandbox): add per-company sandbox mode, reset tools and harness
feat(api): add public developer api keys scopes and webhooks
feat(copilot): add secure AI copilot with approval workflow
feat(edge): add CDN cache policy, invalidation events and vitals reporting
feat(multiregion): add optional regional failover and read fallback
feat(governance): add retention, legal hold and DLP controls
feat(fraud): add anomaly scoring, review queue and alerts
feat(stock): implement lots, expiry alerts and FEFO picking
feat: add purchasing module with suppliers, PO flow and cost methods
feat: add tamper-evident immutable audit ledger and evidence export
feat: add enterprise IAM with SSO MFA and SCIM
feat: add advanced billing trials, usage tiers and enforcer
feat: add api contract testing with versioning and deprecation
feat: recommendations engine
feat: search engine and mobile ops
